text: Sir, evacuation may be futile.

Until such time as the world ends, we will act as though it intends to spin on. Clear out the tech below. Every piece of PHASE 2 on a truck and gone.
Yes, sir. (to standing agents) With me.

text: Fury enters the lab facility where the Tesseract is being by a COMPACT MUON SOLENOID COIL CHAMBER.
Talk to me, doctor. DR. ERIK SELVIG emerges from behind the CMS machine, conc The Tesseract is glowing unusually brighter and flare rin shoot out at random.
Director.
Is there anything we know for certain?
Tesseract is misbehaving.
Is that supposed to be funny?
No, it's not funny at all. The Tesseract is not only active, she's...misbehaving.
How soon until you pull the plug?
She's an energy source. If we turn off the power, she turns it back on. If she reaches peak level...
We've prepared for this, doctor. Harnessing energy from space.
We don't have the harness. Our calculations are far from complete. Now she's throwing off interference, radiation. Nothing harmful, low levels of gamma radiation.
That can be harmful. Where's Barton?
The Hawk? Up in his nest, as usual. We see CLINT BARTON, dressed in black tactical gear, is u the railings watching them below, Fury calls Barton on hi earpiece.

Doctor, it's spiking again.
No one's come or gone. It's oven is clean. No contacts, no I.M.'s. If there was any tampering, sir, it wasn't at this end.
At this end?

Yeah, the cube is a doorway to the other end of space, right? The doors open from both sides. DR. SELVIG clacks away at the keyboard and sees on the monitoring his worst nightmares. HEAVY BREATHING is heard from the platform SHIELD GUARDS slowly approach, weapons in hands. A figure kneeling on the platform, smoke coming off it. It's LOKI. Smiling in his mischievous manner, he raises his head. Th dies down. He looks deep into the eyes of Fury, Barton an Selvig. He stands up, holing the scepter.

Sir, please put down the spear! Loki looks at his spear then suddenly points it at where and Barton are standing and SHOOTS OUT A BLUE EXPLODING L TOWARDS THEM. BARTON TACKLES Fury and they both barely mi Loki's fired shot. ALL HELL BREAKS. Machine gun fire is shot at Loki, but th bullets bounce off him like a boss. Loki jumps high from platform and ATTACKS those firing at him. In the blink of an eye, Loki takes down several guards wi KNIVES and ENERGY BLASTS from the scepter. He stops and w see who will attack him next. Honestly, the whole lab has gone to shit. Barton tries to stand up. Loki quickly walks towards him. raises his gun, but Loki grabs Barton's hand.

You have heart. Loki points the head of his spear at Barton's head. Barto eyes suddenly glow BLACK. The ability to control Barton's is now in Loki's hand. Barton puts his piece away and sta straight. Of course it does. I've come too far for anything else. I am Loki of Asgard, and I am burdened with glorious purpose.

An ant has no quarrel with a boot.
You planning to step on us?

Freedom. Freedom is life's great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart... Like a gunslinger, Loki turns to face Selvig who's standingbehind him and places his spear against Selvig's Selvig's eyes glow BLACK.
You will know peace.
Yeah, you say peace, I kind of think you mean the other thing. From the vacuum chamber ceiling, Tesseract's energy cloud RAPIDLY builds into what may be an implosion.
Sir, Director Fury is stalling. This place is about to blow. Drop a hundred feet of rock on us. He means to bury us.
Like The Pharaohs of Odin.
He's right. The portal is collapsing in on itself. You got maybe two minutes before this goes critical.

Well, then... Loki, looking at Barton, who doesn't even hesitate, SHOOT WHO FALLS TO THE GROUND. Barton grabs the case containing Tesseract and leaves the lab with Loki, Selvig and the ot S.H.I.E.L.D personnel Loki is controlling.

Natasha Romanoff.
Are you here to kill me, Miss Romanoff? Because that's not gonna work out for everyone.
No. No. Of course not. I'm here on behalf of SHIELD.
SHIELD. How did they find me?
We never lost you, doctor. We've kept our distance, even helped keep some other interested parties off your scent.
Why?
Nick Fury seems to trust you. But now I need you to come in.
What if I said no?
I'll persuade you.
And what if the... other guy says no?
You've been more than a year without an incident. I don't think you wanna break that streak.
I don't always get what I want.
Doctor, we're facing a potential global catastrophe.
Well, those I actively try to avoid.
This is the Tesseract. It has the potential energy to wipe out the planet. She shows him a photo of the Tesseract on her cell phone. takes a closer look.
What does Fury want me to do? Swallow it?
Well, he wants you to find it. It's been taken. It emits a gamma signature that's too weak for us to trace. There's no one that knows gamma radiation like you do. If there was, that's where I'd be.
